translation.text: The first set of doors on the first carriage of this service is locked on one side of this train. Please board at the raer set of doors on this carriage, or any other carriage on this service.

From 18 October to mid-December 2020, the north escalator from the concourse to Platforms 24 and 25 (Town Hall end) will be temporarily closed for maintenance works. To access platforms 24 and 25 travel down the concourse to the lift or use the south escalator to Platforms 24 and 25 (Redfern end). You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/document/4930/central-station-map.pdf. If you need assistance, see station staff or phone 9379 1777.
The lift between the concourse and the Princes Highway is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9563 7574.

The Southern Tunnel will be temporarily closed for Sydney Metro works. To access platforms 4 to 12 travel via the Northern Concourse. You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/document/4930/central-station-map.pdf. For more information about Sydney Metro works visit sydneymetro.info.

There are changes to Platforms 20 and 21 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 20 and 21, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.  For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

The Suburban Tunnel is temporarily closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Access for Platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse or Southern Concourse during this period. You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/document/4930/central-station-map.pdf

There are changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

There are changes to Platforms 22 and 23 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.
Access to and from Como Station from Railway Road will be unavailable from Monday 24 August for approximately 6 weeks. During this time, please enter and exit the station via Como Parade.

Due to station upgrade works installing additional Opal gates, the wide access gate on the Eastern side of the concourse will be temporarily closed from 18 September until 16 October. Please use the new wide access gate available on the Western side of the concourse. Please follow the signs or see Station Staff for assistance.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Sunday 18 October to Wednesday 21 October - Nightly from 8pm until 4:30am - The George St entrance/exit to Wynyard Station, Transit Hall and Hunter Tunnel will all be closed due to construction works. Access to/from the station is still available via Carrington St, York St & Barangaroo. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff or call 9224 2959. Please note that planned trackwork is also scheduled on Sunday 18 and Monday 19 nights and may impact how you travel around the City Circle. Please plan your trip in advance by using use the trip plan on your Transport App or transportnsw.info/trip
